sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ff56664a0fc493004cf365ba32050e87
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.findSysID</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Functionality to find which table a specific sys_id belongs to.
</description><name>findSysID</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Searches the sys_id and returns string about the result.
 *
 * @param {string} sys_id - sys_id of the record that is to be found.
 * @return {string} information about the result and an URL if an record is found
 */
function findSysID(sys_id){

    var table_name = [];
	var returnStr = 'Searching for sys_id: ' + sys_id +  ' and the result is:\n\n';
    var table = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');  
    table.orderBy('name');  
    table.query();  
    while (table.next()) {  
        if ((table.getValue('name') != '') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'ts') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'v_') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'dis') &&
			(table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'pa') &&
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'dsc') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'ecc') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'ha_') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'wf_') &&  
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'win') &&
			(table.getValue('name').substring(0,8) != 'sys_roll') &&
            (table.getValue('name').substring(0,4) != 'sysx'))  {  
				
			var object = new GlideRecord(table.name);  
			if (object.get(sys_id)) {  
				table_name.push(table.name.toString());  
			}  
		}  
    }          
    if (table_name) {  
        return returnStr += 'Found ' + sys_id + ' in table(s): ' + table_name.join(', ') + '.\n Use nav_to.do?uri=' + table_name[0] + '.do?sys_id=' + sys_id;  
    }  
    else {  
        return returnStr += 'Did not find sys_id ' + sys_id + '.';  
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-04 15:40:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>ff56664a0fc493004cf365ba32050e87</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>findSysID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ff56664a0fc493004cf365ba32050e87</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-11 17:50:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_48c2871c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e3e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.getDuplicates</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Functionality where you specify a table and a column. it then returns an array of all values that appear more than x amount of times.</description><name>getDuplicates</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Searches the table and value and returns array of which values appear more than @amount of times.
 *
 * @param {string} tablename - Which table to conduct the search in.
 * @param {string} val - Which column(field) to search within the table.
 * @param {int} amount - The number of how times a value should max appears before being put on the list 
 * @return {array} array of which values appear more than @amount of times.
 */
function getDuplicates(tablename,val, amount) {
	var dupRecords = [];
	var gaDupCheck = new GlideAggregate(tablename);
	gaDupCheck.addQuery('active','true');
	gaDupCheck.addAggregate('COUNT',val);
	gaDupCheck.addNotNullQuery(val);
	gaDupCheck.groupBy(val);
	gaDupCheck.addHaving('COUNT', '>', amount);
	gaDupCheck.query();
	while (gaDupCheck.next()) {
		dupRecords.push(gaDupCheck[val].toString());
	}
	return dupRecords;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-11 17:30:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>48c2871c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e3e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getDuplicates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48c2871c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e3e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-11 17:37:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: syntax_editor_macro_75490b500f1cd7004cf365ba32050ef6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments>GlideAjax with JSON return.</comments><name>vargajson</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-11 17:59:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>75490b500f1cd7004cf365ba32050ef6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>vargajson</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_75490b500f1cd7004cf365ba32050ef6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-11 20:00:54</sys_updated_on><text>var ga = new GlideAjax('$0');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', '');
	
	ga.getXML(handleResponse);
	
	function handleResponse(response){
		var answer = JSON.parse(response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"));
		if(answer){

		}
		
	}</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2f554b9c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e51
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.acmeUsefulUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Collection of usefully utilites that might be used within the plattform.</description><name>acmeUsefulUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var acmeUsefulUtils = Class.create();
acmeUsefulUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	/**
 * Searches the table and value and returns array of which values appear more than @amount of times.
 *
 * @param {string} tablename - Which table to conduct the search in.
 * @param {string} val - Which column(field) to search within the table.
 * @param {int} amount - The number of how times a value should max appears before being put on the list 
 * @return {array} array of which values appear more than @amount of times.
 */
	getDuplicates: function (tablename,val, amount) {
		var dupRecords = [];
		var gaDupCheck = new GlideAggregate(tablename);
		gaDupCheck.addQuery('active','true');
		gaDupCheck.addAggregate('COUNT',val);
		gaDupCheck.addNotNullQuery(val);
		gaDupCheck.groupBy(val);
		gaDupCheck.addHaving('COUNT', '>', amount);
		gaDupCheck.query();
		
		while (gaDupCheck.next()) {
			dupRecords.push(gaDupCheck[val].toString());
		}
		return dupRecords;
	},
	/**
 * Searches the sys_id and returns string about the result.
 *
 * @param {string} sys_id - sys_id of the record that is to be found.
 * @return {string} information about the result and an URL if an record is found
 */
	findSysID: function(sys_id){

		var table_name = [];
		var returnStr = 'Searching for sys_id: ' + sys_id +  ' and the result is:\n\n';
		var table = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_db_object');  
		table.orderBy('name');  
		table.query();  
		while (table.next()) {  
			if ((table.getValue('name') != '') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'ts') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'v_') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'dis') &&
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,2) != 'pa') &&
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'dsc') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'ecc') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'ha_') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'wf_') &&  
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,3) != 'win') &&
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,8) != 'sys_roll') &&
				(table.getValue('name').substring(0,4) != 'sysx'))  {  

				var object = new GlideRecord(table.name);  
				if (object.get(sys_id)) {  
					table_name.push(table.name.toString());  
				}  
			}  
		}          
		if (table_name) {  
			return returnStr += 'Found ' + sys_id + ' in table(s): ' + table_name.join(', ') + '.\n Use nav_to.do?uri=' + table_name[0] + '.do?sys_id=' + sys_id;  
		}  
		else {  
			return returnStr += 'Did not find sys_id ' + sys_id + '.';  
		}
	},


	type: 'acmeUsefulUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-11 17:41:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>2f554b9c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e51</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>acmeUsefulUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f554b9c0fd8d7004cf365ba32050e51</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-11 17:49:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
